page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES,ANNAN
page.content: Here are some boy's playground games: { SPOT MARBLES. {Spot}is played with as many people as possible and a football.Everyone is given a number and 3 lives.In order, the ball is kicked against a wall.Any one missing the wall loses a life. After three misses that person is out of the game.The winner is the last person in. {Marbles}are small,coloured glass balls.We play holesy and drainsy.The idea is to roll your marble and your opponent's into a hole or into the small round holes in drains.Whoever gets both marbles into the hole first is the winner and keeps the marbles.
